channel.title: 718 RSPS ~non-spawn~ ~good economy~ ~all bosses~ ~oldlook/newlook~
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Digital RSPS[/size]
[u]Some info about us![/u] -Skilling -Great economy -Working gwd bosses/nex -OLD LOOK & NEW LOOK options -Working chaotics & zaros armor -Pk just like the good old days -Squeel of fortune -All new players recieve a chance to get riches at the start with a grab bag by admin Smokey Bear -Working corporeal beast -Quest tab teleports -Skilling area for all your skilling needs -Jadinko lair -Polypore dungeon -Slayer tower & slayer tasks -Queen & King black dragon -Lunars/ancients/curses -Great staff -Fight caves & fight kiln -Works with HD & resizeable
We ARE still in our beginning stages and we need people to begin playing so we can build our community, we welcome all feedback and all new players until our official release will receive beginning rewards!
Note that Dung is still in the process of being coded in and is expected to be done within next week along with any other tweaking skills need.
---------WELL SET EXP RATES-------> We feel that having a 99 should be some what of an achievement even on a private server, our exp rates are not too high or too low; they're just right so that a 99 actually feels like an achievement.
Our shop items are priced in accordance to how we feel it fit for a good economy, there will be no item spawning so most rare items will either be given away at holidays or dropped by admins/monsters.
We respect everybody so please respect us back for we don't want any arguing between anybody, if you have a tip or complaint please feel free to contact Smokey Bear, Mod Naso or Mod Tyler.
Most importantly, have fun on our server because that's what it's here for.
>>>>>>>>> http://www.mediafire.com/download/q9duecbcy98374u/Digital_Client_v1.0.zip <<<<<<<<<<

item.dc:creator: @sipan9000 sipan9000
item.description:
@sipan9000 wrote:

[quote=“dizaster798, post:4, topic:526266”]Where is everyone?
I’m ambition in game :S[/quote]

We are still in beta and we’re beginning to get old players back from our first Digital Pkz server along with new players, please bare with us as we just began work on this a few weeks ago and we are almost ready to open ~currently in beta~ ( we will be rewarding players that help us get numbers and find bugs for us to fix during beta )

Read full topic

item.title: 718 RSPS ~non-spawn~ ~good economy~ ~all bosses~ ~oldlook/newlook~
item.dc:creator: @sipan9000 sipan9000
item.description:
@sipan9000 wrote:

                               [size=36pt]Digital RSPS[/size]

Some info about us!
-Skilling
-Great economy
-Working gwd bosses/nex
-OLD LOOK & NEW LOOK options
-Working chaotics & zaros armor
-Pk just like the good old days
-Squeel of fortune
-All new players recieve a chance to get riches at the start with a grab bag by admin Smokey Bear
-Working corporeal beast
-Quest tab teleports
-Skilling area for all your skilling needs
-Jadinko lair
-Polypore dungeon
-Slayer tower & slayer tasks
-Queen & King black dragon
-Lunars/ancients/curses
-Great staff
-Fight caves & fight kiln
-Works with HD & resizeable

We ARE still in our beginning stages and we need people to begin playing so we can build our community, we welcome all feedback and all new players until our official release will receive beginning rewards!

Note that Dung is still in the process of being coded in and is expected to be done within next week along with any other tweaking skills need.

---------WELL SET EXP RATES-------> We feel that having a 99 should be some what of an achievement even on a private server, our exp rates are not too high or too low; they’re just right so that a 99 actually feels like an achievement.

Our shop items are priced in accordance to how we feel it fit for a good economy, there will be no item spawning so most rare items will either be given away at holidays or dropped by admins/monsters.

We respect everybody so please respect us back for we don’t want any arguing between anybody, if you have a tip or complaint please feel free to contact Smokey Bear, Mod Naso or Mod Tyler.

Most importantly, have fun on our server because that’s what it’s here for.

http://www.mediafire.com/download/q9duecbcy98374u/Digital_Client_v1.0.zip <<<<<<<<<<

Read full topic
